title: High On You
description: Eden:I've got a crooked past. A past I'd rather forget ever happened. So, I moved somewhere new to start afresh. For a short while, I managed to do that until my new neighbor showed up. Xavier Carter. He got grey eyes like a brewing storm. He is broody as he is sweet.He makes me want more.But the shadows of my past keep creeping from the darkest corners.Xavier:Eden takes me by surprise. She is beautiful and kind.Yet, behind her pretty eyes and breathtaking smile is a haunted soul.Can we surrender to these blossoming feelings or will our pasts hold us back?
author: Hailey Smoke
